snippet.title: Ayakos Mission Official Steam Trailer - - A 2D Top Down Shoot'em Up
snippet.description:
#arcade #shooter #shmups #steam 
Check it out on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2455680/Ayakos_Mission/
Ayako's Mission is a 2D Top-Down Shoot'em Up game which is based on the story of the war breaking out between the two territories called, AY Corp and ATO Corp. where you must defend your territory against the invaders.
